pageProduct.name: Poise Discreet Pad Extra 12 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

POISE® Thin & Discreet Extra Pads have been specifically designed for bladder leaks, with the superior 3-in-1 dryness, comfort and odour control which a period pad can't provide! Poise Thin & Discreet Super pads are 45% thinner than Poise regular pads and 7x drier than daytime ultrathin period pads.

  • Superior 3-in-1 dryness, comfort and odour control which a period pad can't provide
  • Incredibly Thin & Dry - UltraLite™ 5 layer absorbent core is 45% thinner than Extra Plus POISE Pads, you'll barely know it's there 
  • RapidDry™ cover is 7x drier than leading daytime Ultrathin period pads
  • ABSORB-LOC Core instantly and continuously neutralises odours 
  • Ultimate Protection - Leak-Block side shields for outstanding protection 
  • All day comfort - Thin-Flex core designed to hold its shape all day without scrunching, bunching, twisting or curling 
  • Leak-Block™ side shields for outstanding protection.
  • Individually wrapped - hygienic & discreet 

Size: 12 Pack
